description:
The Mad Gear Gang has returned,
and they’re out for revenge! They've
kidnapped Guy's master, Genryusai,
and his daughter, Rena, who is also
Guy's fiancée. Join Haggar and
newcomers Maki and Carlos to take
down the Mad Gear Gang once and
for all!

Take control of any of the three
heroes and make use of their unique
abilities in a fast-paced adventure
which will take you to all locations of
the globe. And you're not alone,
either - you can also have a friend
join the fight to bring an end to the
Mad Gear Gang!

This is the US version of the game.
name: Final Fight 2™
